title: Low Priority Queue Time Penalty bugged???
body:
I had to wait 20 minutes once.

So I waited with a timer, I timed 10 minutes, and when I came back, the timer on LoLClient was around 13 minutes??

So I waited 10 more minutes and I came back, the timer on LoLClient was around 7 minutes????

So I played a song that was 6:09 and the song finished, and LoLClient was around 3 minutes??????

Riot can you explain????????
I am supposed to wait 20 minutes and ended up waiting 30 (which it then looped back to 20)???

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Justify,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=EAjw9RBW,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2014-12-16T02:51:02.180+0000)
>
> riot doesn't like degenerates

Did you just down vote my post? I'm sorry for removing you from my friend's list man, it wasn't personal. I hope you still remember our "friendship", I was airaze.
